the same point at the bottom when i have made the shape of the nose this way solid with yarn i go back and stick back and forth with satin stitch horizontally with the shape of the nose this gives the nose good shape and makes it stick out just a little stuff nose and sew on to the face i find it helps to stuff lightly sew on most of the way then finish stuffing and finishing sewing on ears with
